TopicTitle: Gilly: The place of no Gravity.

Articles.Content: Gilly, the place where solar panels can double as safe landing gear
Gilly: Where dreams of Flying come true
Gilly, a planet on which you can use a few well controlled farts to get you into a stable orbit.

Gilly, where a sneeze is a high delta-V maneuver.

Gilly, best place to train for the upcoming asteroids.

Gilly, where if you land with your gear up extending them will launch you.

Gilly: Where ant engines are efficient.

http://i.imgur.com/PmDGLr5.png

A rover on Gilly? WHAT SORCERY IS THIS?!

Nice, but in theory isn't there no place in the universe where there is zero gravity? Doesn't the force of gravity extend forever?

KSP has taught me so.

I kinda cringed when I heard someone say "...and the astronaut stays floating in space above Earth due to lack of gravity...".

But let's not get off-topic.

Gilly, where jumping for joy can leave you stranded in space.

Gilly, the only place where taking a leak can throw off your tsiolkovsky rocket equation calculations

Gilly, where everything flies up and the gravity don't matter (apologies to WLITA)

Gilly, where having the weight of the world on your shoulders doesn't seem like such a problem.
Gilly, where you can see your flag F4 marker thingies from the other side of the planet.
Gilly, the place that you couldn't land on until 41 days after release

Gilly, the only place where taking a leak can throw off your tsiolkovsky rocket equation calculations.

Sounds like a good anticlimax for a space thriller. They have to reorient the craft so that the solar panels can restart some vital systems, or else they'll all die.
gilly : the place that I now must go to for my next inter-planetary mission
Gilly: the place where litho braking is practical.
Gilly: The place lower than hackers.
Gilly: the place where flags can be placed sideways
Gilly: where you can make jokes about gilly's gravity

Gilly: Where ant engines are efficient.

A rover on Gilly? WHAT SORCERY IS THIS?!

.

Well, It didn't work. It needed to have some propulsion or be heavier. Either that, or it changed since 0.17 roving.. sigh...

...I KNOW WHY! The suspension is causing it to bounce! Dammit new suspension!
Gilly: The one place where you have to thrust downwards to get to the surface anytime in the same day.
You don't do pushups on Gilly. You push Gilly down.
Gilly: The place of Planetary Anihlation.
Gilly: Where you can go Around The World in 80 Minutes.
Gilly: A place where solar panels make great landing gears.

okay, now im seeing repeats...

anyways...

gilly : the place where your ship will be half in the soi and half out at the same time !
Gilly; passing gas not recommended.
Gilly: After watching the entirety of Gravity (film), you'll find yourself only a centimeter lower from where you were before.
Gilly: the only place where you can jump over a mountain.
Gilly: The place where you can jump, walk away from the keyboard to order a pizza, and come back before you return to the ground.
